title: 【unturned3.12.3.0更新】黄金武士刀什么的，真的不会融化吗
author: Yihc
txt_content:
3.12.3.0 UpdateNotes
CommunityAnnouncements - Nelson Sexton
添加: 
· 添加了黄金武士刀，黄金沙漠之鹰皮肤以供DLC玩家! · 添加了能在化妆界面自定义黄金皮肤. 
· 添加了载具赛车. [ID 77-84] 
· 添加了载具拖拉机. [ID 85] 
· 添加了载具巴士. [ID 86] 
· 添加了军用吉普(敞篷的). [ID 87-88] 
· 添加了枪械yuri. [ID 1041] 
· 添加了枪械yuri弹夹. [ID 1042] 
· 添加了赛道. 
· 添加了赛道护栏#2. 
· 添加了露天观众台#1. 
· 添加了棒球场#1. 
· 添加了农业设备#1. 
· 添加了公车站点长凳 #1. 
· 添加了公车站点站台 #2. 
· 添加了赛车的残骸. 
· 添加了拖拉机的残骸. 
· 添加了巴士残骸. 
· 添加了军用残骸. 
· 添加了公开了katana, timberwolf, zubeknakov, ace anddesert falcon sources文件. 
· 添加了地图文档里自定义天气的介绍.
改进: 
· 改进了载具的悬挂/相应机制. 
· 改进了载具的网格/操控平滑性. 
· 改进了客户端中移动的载具的更新方式. 
· 改进了消防员/建筑工人服上的反光. 
· 改进了加油物件的检测.
调整: 
· 调整了枪耐久越低，伤害越低. 
· 调整了PEI里军用物资的刷新机制. 
· 调整了PEI里农场军-营里载具的刷新机制. 
· 调整了snayperskya/sabertooth射程范围(调高了些). 
· 调整了cobra后坐力增大，杀伤力减少. 
· 调整了kryzkarek可配置ranger suppressor. 
· 调整了heartbreaker的杀伤力(减低). 
· 调整了营火的亮度范围. 
· 调整了武士刀的刀身弧度. 
· 调整了viper的弹夹模型. 
· 调整了cargo pant/parka的护甲值（调低）. 
· 调整了military shirt/pant的护甲值（调高）.
修复: 
· 修复了左手模式下弹壳飞向的问题. 
· 修复了由于分辨率尺寸的问题导致游戏显示极小的问题. 
· 修复了没穿裤子时帽子护甲值的问题. 
· 修复了爬行丧尸的头部会移动/落下的问题. 
· 修复了没有车灯的载具依旧可以打开灯的问题. 
· 修复了viper枪械在按F的时候弹夹的问题. 
· 修复了如果加载太久，玩家角色会发生变化. 
· 修复了desert falcon耐久度的问题. 
· 修复了拆解matamorez时会发生的问题. 
· 修复了会显示unknow物品的问题. 
· 修复了会把astronaut shirt穿在角色的问题. 
· 修复了有时候弓箭杀伤力太强的问题. 
· 修复了avenger弹夹位置的问题. 
· 修复了破坏箱子后物品掉出捡起后会出现复制物品的问题. 
· 修复了kryzkarek对动物杀伤力的问题. 
· 修复了弹丸亮度的问题. 
· 修复了堡垒门会旋转的问题. 
· 修复了物品数据列表会重置的问题.
katana（武士刀） and desert falcon（沙漠之鹰）是在投票排名表中被最希望有黄金皮肤的武器，所以我就做了，但是fearnot以及几个也是比较被希望有黄金皮肤的武器，你们也将会在之后的更新中逐一见到！





原文：

3.12.3.0 UpdateNotes
CommunityAnnouncements - Nelson Sexton
Additions: 
· Added Gold katana and desert falcon cosmetic skins forGold members! 
· Added ability to equip Gold cosmetic skins from thecosmetic item menu. 
· Added racecar. [ID 77-84] 
· Added tractor. [ID 85] 
· Added bus. [ID 86] 
· Added military jeep. [ID 87-88] 
· Added yuri. [ID 1041] 
· Added yuri magazine. [ID 1042] 
· Added racetrack to default road bundle. 
· Added racetrack fence block #2. 
· Added bleacher #1. 
· Added baseball diamond #1. 
· Added agriculture equipment #1. 
· Added transit bench #1. 
· Added transit cover #2. 
· Added destroyed racecar. 
· Added destroyed tractor. 
· Added destroyed bus. 
· Added destroyed jeep. 
· Added unwrapped katana, timberwolf, zubeknakov, ace anddesert falcon sources. 
· Added info about custom ambience to maps documentation.
Improvements: 
· Improved vehicle handling/responsiveness. 
· Improved vehicle networking/control smoothness. 
· Improved how clients update moving vehicles. 
· Improved reflective stips on firefighter/constructionuniform. 
· Improved fuel filling object detection.
Tweaks: 
· Tweaked gun damage dropoff when quality is low. 
· Tweaked militia item spawns on PEI. 
· Tweaked farm and military vehicle spawns on PEI. 
· Tweaked snayperskya/sabertooth range a bit higher. 
· Tweaked cobra recoil a bit higher and reduced damage. 
· Tweaked kryzkarek to accept ranger suppressor. 
· Tweaked heartbreaker damage a bit lower. 
· Tweaked size of campfire glow. 
· Tweaked katana blade curvyness. 
· Tweaked viper magazine appearance. 
· Tweaked cargo pant/parka armor a bit lower. 
· Tweaked military shirt/pant armor a bit higher.
Fixes: 
· Fixed shell casing direction in left handed mode. 
· Fixed window resize order issue causing tiny screen. 
· Fixed hat armor when not wearing pants. 
· Fixed crawler zombie ragdoll head flopping. 
· Fixed toggling headlights on vehicles without them. 
· Fixed viper inspect animation magazine. 
· Fixed character to randomize if loading outside range. 
· Fixed desert falcon durability loss. 
· Fixed scrapping matamorez. 
· Fixed displaying name of unknown item. 
· Fixed wearing astronaut shirt on feet. 
· Fixed case where arrows could take too much damage. 
· Fixed avenger magazine position. 
· Fixed duping by taking items out of destroyed crates. 
· Fixed kryzkarek animal damage. 
· Fixed bullet casing shinyness. 
· Fixed bunker basement door rotation. 
· Fixed resetting item packages list.
The katana and desert falcon were votedas the most desired weapons to see Gold which is why they were picked, but fearnot several more of the top choices will quite likely see the same upgrade!



有错误请指出，本来并不想翻译。。事情太多了，但是版内也没人翻译，那我就来发一下吧。。
